_S.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

Reminder.description: A document used to remind a customer of payments past due.

Reminder.title: Reminder. Details
Reminder.description: A document used to remind a customer of payments past due.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Reminder. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Reminder. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Reminder. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Reminder. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Reminder. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Reminder. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Reminder. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Reminder. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Reminder. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

ReminderTypeCode.title: Reminder. Reminder Type Code. Code
ReminderTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of the Reminder.

ReminderSequenceNumeric.title: Reminder. Reminder Sequence. Numeric
ReminderSequenceNumeric.description: The number of the current Reminder in the sequence of reminders relating to the specified payments; the number of reminders previously sent plus one.

Note.title: Reminder. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

TaxPointDate.title: Reminder. Tax Point Date. Date
TaxPointDate.description: The date of the Reminder, used to indicate the point at which tax becomes applicable.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Reminder. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

TaxCurrencyCode.title: Reminder. Tax_ Currency Code. Code
TaxCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for tax amounts in the Reminder.

PricingCurrencyCode.title: Reminder. Pricing_ Currency Code. Code
PricingCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for prices in the Reminder.

PaymentCurrencyCode.title: Reminder. Payment_ Currency Code. Code
PaymentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the currency used for payment in the Reminder.

PaymentAlternativeCurrencyCode.title: Reminder. Payment Alternative_ Currency Code. Code
PaymentAlternativeCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the alternative currency used for payment in the Reminder.

AccountingCostCode.title: Reminder. Accounting Cost Code. Code
AccountingCostCode.description: The buyer's accounting code, applied to the Reminder as a whole.

AccountingCost.title: Reminder. Accounting Cost. Text
AccountingCost.description: The buyer's accounting code, applied to the Reminder as a whole, expressed as text.

LineCountNumeric.title: Reminder. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Reminder Lines in this document.

ReminderPeriod.title: Reminder. Reminder_ Period. Period
ReminderPeriod.description: The periods to which the Reminder applies.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Reminder. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Reminder. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Reminder. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Reminder. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party

PaymentTerms.title: Reminder. Payment Terms
PaymentTerms.description: A set of payment terms associated with this document.

AllowanceCharge.title: Reminder. Allowance Charge
AllowanceCharge.description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.

TaxExchangeRate.title: Reminder. Tax_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
TaxExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the tax currency.

PricingExchangeRate.title: Reminder. Pricing_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PricingExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the pricing currency.

PaymentExchangeRate.title: Reminder. Payment_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment currency.

PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate.title: Reminder. Payment Alternative_ Exchange Rate. Exchange Rate
PaymentAlternativeExchangeRate.description: The exchange rate between the document currency and the payment alternative currency.

TaxTotal.title: Reminder. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax.

LegalMonetaryTotal.title: Reminder. Legal_ Monetary Total. Monetary Total
LegalMonetaryTotal.description: The total amount payable on the Invoice, including Allowances, Charges, and Taxes.

ReminderLine.title: Reminder. Reminder Line
ReminderLine.description: A line describing a payment past due.
